ygData.subject: Someone take me under their wing!
ygData.msgSnippet: hello :) I m completely new to EQ but absolutely fascinated. Dying to try it out. I read today that a mid-level player can let a friend play for free for about
ygData.messageBody:
hello :)

I'm completely new to EQ but absolutely fascinated. Dying to try it
out. I read today that a mid-level player can let a friend play for
free for about a month. It sounds great. I asked a friend on Icq but
her account is paid for by someone else so that's out of the
question.
This probably looks very silly but I'm willing to take the risk.
Could someone please do this for me?
I'm loyal and trustworthy.
Thanks :D

The link is here:
http://eqlive.station.sony.com/news_section/newsview.jsp?story=62304

~Svetlana
svetamethyst@...
